questions.text: In the newspaper picture, who was with President Bartlet?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Josh put a newspaper picture up on the cork board and asked Charlie about this person being the next Vice President. Viewers didn't see the picture until the end of the teaser when a picture of Leo with the President was shown.

questions.text: What did Toby buy for Andy?
questions.explanation:
House.

	Andy turned down the house and Toby's marriage proposal.

questions.text: Who was almost born on the Long Island Expressway?
questions.explanation:
Mallory.

	The men were talking about the differences in births then and now.

questions.text: Who did Wes say he could kill and make up a reason for the kill later?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh and Wes were walking down the corridor when Wes said this. Josh was asking Wes a lot of questions prompting Wes to say this.

questions.text: Which Secret Service Agent on Zoey's detail flipped Wes in front of the President?
questions.explanation:
Molly.

	The President wanted to know if the Secret Service agents could take care of Zoey.

questions.text: Josh took off his pants after stepping into a creek.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Josh and Charlie had gone to the Arboretum where they accidentally stepped in a creek. Josh told Wes about taking off his pants while they were outside the night club Zoey was in.

questions.text: Who fell asleep in CJ's office?
questions.explanation:
Danny.

	He had just gotten off a plane and hadn't slept yet. CJ screamed when she saw him and caused Danny to scream.

Yes.

	Andy went into labor while she and Toby were together. She was supposed to pick a date to induce labor.

questions.text: Who asked Donna if she was in love with Josh?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	Donna didn't answer her question.

True.

	Zoey was kidnapped from the club and Molly was found shot in the head. Zoey's panic button was found in the alley behind the club.
